NewsItem.HEADLINE: Edge Computing in Mobile Networks Annual Market Study 2019 (PDF) with Forecast (Excel File)
NewsItem.SUMMARY: Clear financial modeling of cost vs revenue for EC in mobile networks. Includes crisp guidance of revenue for multiple apps according to latency requirement.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: This forecast examines the deployment of data centers and servers by web-scale players in regional colocation facilities, as well as deployment of "micro" data centers by neutral hosts and by mobile operators at a local level. Servers at the tower and on-premises for an enterprise are also forecasted. This complete view of Edge Computing for Mobile Networks illustrates the impact of 5G and shows how the business model will settle down in each vertical market.
